name: ListenDailyNews

skdetail:

Invocation Name: listen daily news
des:
Your Daily Audio | News Summary

Daily news summary you can listen to in the car on your way to work or on the train or bus. When you want to know what is going on in the world but are unable to read
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
